effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 628,729.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 905 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 905 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 4.2 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
